DOC.brief_summary: To determine whether female patient preference tegaserod PEG 3350 relative dosage form , convenience , ease administration taste
DOC.brief_title: Preference Tegaserod vs. PEG 3350 Patients With Constipation
DOC.criteria: Females age 18 64 year age Patients constipation define Rome II criterion Patients previously treat tegaserod and/or PEG 3350 Evidence cathartic colon history laxative abuse laxative dependence History fecal impaction necessitate surgical intervention Patients clinically significant abnormal TSH level screen Women pregnant breast feed Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply
